text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product specifications and product specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product specification:
minecraft cube White Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge Screen Cover Case Luxurious and Fashion Design

Product specifications:
Magnetic closure for increased protection
Durable full-frame protection from drops and dings
Vibrant and realistic 3D floral pattern 
Special coating provides a smooth rubber grip
Keep your phone away from scratches, bumps and dust.
text.Response A: With this gorgeous White Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge Screen Cover Case, you can protect your phone in true style. The luxurious and fashion design features a gorgeous 3D floral pattern for a vivid and realistic look. The case has a durable full-frame construction that provides reliable protection from bumps, dings and scratches, while the special coating offers a smooth rubber-like grip for added comfort. Plus, the magnetic closure ensures your phone is well protected at all times.
text.Response B: This Case for the Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge is made of high-quality, lightweight, and durable plastic that covers back and sides. The case has a smooth rubber coating that provides extra grip and a smooth, comfortable feel. It has a perfect fit to your phone and protects it from scratches, dust, and bumps. The magnetic closure provides increased protection and security for your phone.

meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

1.displayed_text:
Prompt

Your client has asked you to write a product description using product specifications and product specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product specification:
minecraft cube White Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge Screen Cover Case Luxurious and Fashion Design

Product specifications:
Magnetic closure for increased protection
Durable full-frame protection from drops and dings
Vibrant and realistic 3D floral pattern
Special coating provides a smooth rubber grip
Keep your phone away from scratches, bumps and dust.

Response A

With this gorgeous White Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge Screen Cover Case, you can protect your phone in true style. The luxurious and fashion design features a gorgeous 3D floral pattern for a vivid and realistic look. The case has a durable full-frame construction that provides reliable protection from bumps, dings and scratches, while the special coating offers a smooth rubber-like grip for added comfort. Plus, the magnetic closure ensures your phone is well protected at all times.

Response B

This Case for the Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge is made of high-quality, lightweight, and durable plastic that covers back and sides. The case has a smooth rubber coating that provides extra grip and a smooth, comfortable feel. It has a perfect fit to your phone and protects it from scratches, dust, and bumps. The magnetic closure provides increased protection and security for your phone.
